thread.title: a very good family hotel
thread.title_full: a very good family hotel - Review of Gardens NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: vilma marianel... e
title: a very good family hotel
text:
a very nice and pleasant hotel to stay....spacious, lots of closets. clean and over all good beds,,the staff exelent, but if you need help of any kind, ask for PEDRO HILARIO he is the one to help you. CVS farmasy on the corner day and night, MORTON WILLAMS SUPERMARKEt on other corner,restaurants walking distance and a few resraurant deliver to the hotel...Ah,,,,rooms have full kitchen.
Room Tip: THE ONE BEDROOM SUITE have a balcony with a round table for 4 and two big chairs See more room tips
